original_text: And when he had opened the third seal, I heard the third beast say, Come and see. And I beheld, and lo a black horse; and he that sat on him had a pair of balances in his hand.
korean_text: 셋째 인을 떼실 때에 내가 들으니 셋째 생물이 말하되 오라 하기로 내가 보니 검은 말이 나오는데 그 탄 자가 손에 저울을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: And when he had opened the third seal
I heard the third beast say
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 세 번째 생물이 말하는 것을 들었으니

sentences.original_text: and he that sat on him
had a pair of balances in his hand
